doc.field: John and J. Andrew Ditmas enlistment certificates
John and J. Andrew Ditmas enlistment certificates
Two enlistment certificates, one to John Ditmas and one to J. Andrew Ditmas, in the company of the Horse Artillery, First Regiment, First Brigade.
